name: MLFeatureDescription
desc: The name, type, and constraints of an input or output feature.

items.name: enum MLFeatureType
items.desc: The possible types for feature values, input features, and output features.

items.name: var isOptional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this feature is optional.

items.name: func isAllowedValue(MLFeatureValue) -> Bool
items.desc: Checks whether the model will accept an input feature value.

items.name: var imageConstraint: MLImageConstraint?
items.desc: The size and format constraints for an image feature.

items.name: class MLImageConstraint
items.desc: The width, height, and pixel format constraints of an image feature.

items.name: var dictionaryConstraint: MLDictionaryConstraint?
items.desc: The constraint for a dictionary feature.

items.name: class MLDictionaryConstraint
items.desc: The constraint on the keys for a dictionary feature.

items.name: var multiArrayConstraint: MLMultiArrayConstraint?
items.desc: The constraints on a multidimensional array feature.

items.name: class MLMultiArrayConstraint
items.desc: The shape and data type constraints for a multidimensional array feature.

items.name: var sequenceConstraint: MLSequenceConstraint?
items.desc: The constraints for a sequence feature.

items.name: class MLSequenceConstraint
items.desc: The constraints for a sequence feature.
